content.rendered:
Want to get the most out of your sticker?

Commonly used for sticker business cards or sticker sheets, designing for the Excess Space will unlock all the potential of kiss cut stickers!

 

Pick and choose where you want the kiss cut lines on your business cards! You can either include in the notes of your order where you’d like the cutlines or you’re welcome to add your own cutlines in a PDF file!

 

 

Left: Sticker Ninja business cards   |   Right: the cutlines for the sticker. Pink indicates the kiss cut, and the red is the die cut.

 

Left: Finished business cards   |   Right: the cutlines for the sticker. Pink indicates the kiss cut, and the red is the die cut.

 

The same method can be applied to sticker sheets! Pick and choose where you want the kiss cut lines, and place information or background artwork in the Excess Space.

 

 

Left: Include your contact information in the excess space   |    Right: enhance your sheets with background images
